review: I used to have an Apple TV in the past and loved it. That was part of the reason I purchased a new one. After receiving my new model I started having issues with the ATV dropping out of home share. While watching a movie it would drop like every 5-10 min. It was so aggravating. Doing some research on line I found that this was a common problem. Apple still has not come out with a fix. I have traced this problem to at least a year ago. Many people have complained about this issue with Apple. They still have come out with a correction to this issue.I loved this product in the past and would happily recommend this to others if Apple would get on board to fix the glitch. Right now my ATV 3 is a hundred dollar paperweight.

review: So easy to set up. Simply plugged in 2 cords (had to purchase HDMI cord separately), did the software update and it was up and going in about 5 minutes. I am a photographer and I love being able to see my photos on a big screen. I also enjoy being able to see my videos and movies that I purchased from iTunes on the big screen.  It does so much more, like being able to rent new lelease movies for about $4.99.  I can't wait till my kids get home from school, they are going to love it. I may purchase a coupe more of these for my kids rooms as well. They will love watching Netflix and utube videos on their tvs. Thumbs up Apple you've made another great product. I should have bought this long ago.
